LinearAlgebraicRepresentation.jl

Dependencies

Plasm.jl has one Julia dependency and one Python dependency:

  • LARLIB

  • Pyplasm

Docstrings conventions

Bold is used to point out theory concepts. For example, look at the "2-skeletons" word in the docstring of LinearAlgebraicRepresentation.skel_merge:

Monospace is used for everything code related. Look e.g. at "Points", "Cells" and "Hpc" in the definition docstring of mkpol:

mkpol(verts::Points, cells::Cells)::Hpc
Note

In Julia REPL the monospace text is the one colored differently. In a terminal you will see something like:
